TEXT.TITLE: AMEX TRADING ADAMS-RUSSELL ELECTRONICS <AEI>
TEXT.BODY: The American Stock Exchange said it has started trading the common stock of Adams-Russell Electronics Co Inc, which had been traded on the NASDAQ system. Reuter
